virophage.gui

Class GameScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Canvas
        • virophage.gui.GameScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GameScreen
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A GameScreen is a GUI component that renders the game.
    Since:
    2014-05-6
    Author:
    Max Ovsiankin, Leon Ren
    See Also:
